scenario_text.value:
Hey, I haven’t seen y’all before... Don’t
tell me you’re the missing students?
(Crap, now what am I supposed to say?)

It’s not safe to lollygag around here, so get
back to yer school already!
Back to school? What do you mean?

Things were shaking so hard it started
a landslide. Students even went missing!

So all students who are still safe got called
back to school, apparently.
I’d go, too, if I were you.

All the other students went back to the
school, so you should, too, understand?
